description:
It`s been three months since Haru`s dream to live under the same roof with all three of his brothers came true. However, the situation at the Kaidou household suddenly becomes stormy when Haruko announces she`s taking Ren back to Switzerland with her. Even after Ren hears about Haruko`s secret loneliness from Miki, he still wishes to stay in Japan as long as Haru wants him. But unable to express his desire in words, Ren continues to remain "just a brother" to Haru...
Source: crunchyroll
